summary: The diff implements the requested single-page portfolio sections (Header, sticky nav, Articles, Expertise, Stats, About, Footer) with Tailwind/shadcn styling and section IDs. However, it also introduces unrequested backend/authentication infrastructure and adds extra footer attribution text not specified in the BuildRequest; and the visual-theme constraint about avoiding a blue+purple dual theme cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement the Footer with the provided copyright line and “Portfolio Last Updated: February 15, 2026” and ensure footer text matches exactly.
missing_requirements.reason: Footer includes additional attribution content ("Built with ... using caffeine.ai") beyond the requested two lines, so the footer text does not "match exactly" the provided HTML/requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend canister entrypoint (Motoko actor) despite requirement for a static frontend and "No backend is required".
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states no backend is required unless strictly necessary; the portfolio is implemented with frontend constants, so adding backend/main.mo is unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and actor-creation hooks added, implying authentication/user identity support.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly exclude adding authentication (Internet Identity) or user accounts; yet the app is wrapped in InternetIdentityProvider and includes auth/actor hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes third-party attribution link with UTM tracking (caffeine.ai) and a heart icon line.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-8 and conflicts with "Footer text matches exactly" acceptance criteria.
